author: iik1997
body: Castor calorimeter pmt gain, photoelectronsToAnalog, set to 4.24 divided by 20 to work around saturation of digital signals in PbPb simulation; this assumes also a corresponding check of conditions (previous setup was 4.24 / 5 and was valid for pPb)
title: Scale down Castor photoelectron gain at digi step to avoid saturation in simulation of PbPb
